company_offeredRole: Solution Architect for HR Digital Products m/f
listing_jobDesc:
About us
Airbus pioneers sustainable aerospace for a safe and united world. The Company constantly innovates to provide efficient and technologically-advanced solutions in aerospace, defence, and connected services. In commercial aircraft, Airbus offers modern and fuel-efficient airliners and associated services. Airbus is also a European leader in defence and security and one of the world's leading space businesses. In helicopters, Airbus provides the most efficient civil and military rotorcraft solutions and services worldwide.
Job description

Airbus Commercial Aircraft is looking for a Solution Architect for HR Digital Products m/f to join our Information Management Department based in Toulouse , France.

As a Solution Architect for HR Digital Products you will be joining the IT team dedicated to the HR Domain . The team is in charge of all Airbus Digital HR portfolio (Airbus Aircraft, Airbus Helicopter & Airbus Defense & Space). The scope and its deployment are worldwide .

Your working environment:
Global capital of aeronautics and European capital for space research, Toulouse is a dynamic city in the southwest of France served by an international airport. Ideally located between the Mediterranean sea and the Atlantic ocean and close to the Pyrenees mountains, it offers plenty of options for outdoor activities!

How we care for you:
Financial rewards: Attractive salary, agreements on success and profit sharing schemes, employee savings plan abounded by Airbus and employee stock purchase plan on a voluntary basis.

Work / Life Balance: Extra days-off for special occasions, holiday transfer option, a Staff council offering many social, cultural and sport activities and other services.

Wellbeing / Health: Complementary health insurance coverage (disability, invalidity, death). Depending on the site: health services center, concierge services, gym, carpooling application.

Individual development: Great upskilling opportunities and development prospects with unlimited access to +10.000 e-learning courses to develop your employability, certifications, expert career path, accelerated development programmes, national and international mobility.
At Airbus, we support you to work, connect and collaborate more easily and flexibly. Wherever possible, we foster flexible working arrangements to stimulate innovative thinking.

Your challenges:
Be the technical leader for the design and the decisions regarding technical solutions and recommend alternatives when needed

Be responsible for the integration part in the Architecture Requirements Dossier (ARD) and Security Dossier (SD)

Define and maintain patterns, best practices and golden rules in the integration of software solutions

Support the Product Service Lines Product Managers on technical projects (e.g. DevOps implementation) and issues on their products

Translate functional requirements into technical specifications

Ensure continuous improvement on Information Management applications, tools and processes

Ensure the security in the data interoperability by providing the right recommendations, liaising with the IM Security department

Your boarding pass:
Engineer's degree (or equivalent) in IT or a related discipline

In-depth knowledge of integration & interface solutions, tools and standards (Ideally WORKDAY (HR Digital Platform), AWS, IAM )

In-depth knowledge of security management (endpoint security, mobile security ...)

In-depth knowledge of IT technical infrastructure components related to integration patterns

Team spirit

Advanced level of English

This position will require a security clearance or will require being eligible for clearance by the recognized authorities.

Salary range:
Salary range based on the required profile: 65k to 75K/year (including a variable part based on your performance). Information provided as an indication.

Not a 100% match? No worries! Airbus supports your personal growth with customized development solutions.

Take your career to a new level and apply online now!

This job requires an awareness of any potential compliance risks and a commitment to act with integrity, as the foundation for the Companys success, reputation and sustainable growth

By submitting your CV or application you are consenting to Airbus using and storing information about you for monitoring purposes relating to your application or future employment. This information will only be used by Airbus.
Airbus is committed to achieving workforce diversity and creating an inclusive working environment. We welcome all applications irrespective of social and cultural background, age, gender, disability, sexual orientation or religious belief.

At Airbus, we support you to work, connect and collaborate more easily and flexibly. Wherever possible, we foster flexible working arrangements to stimulate innovative thinking.Show more Report

listing_jobDesc:
Develop visualization dashboards and ETL (Extract, Load, Transform) jobs 
Support the development of a new data warehouse 
Participate in the definition of analytics layers and best practices to develop a data-driven culture at the company level 
Work closely with data engineers and data analysts to unlock the full analytics potential of our data structure 
Continually enhance the data pipeline architecture to handle increasing volumes of data, while ensuring high levels of performance and reliability 
Previous experience in a Data Analyst or Data Engineer position 
Strong analytical skills 
Proficiency in SQL and/or an object-oriented programming language (ex: Python) 
Experience with Git & GitHub 
You are curious about both the business and the technical sides of things 
You are a team player - always demonstrate a can-do attitude and want to work in a team 
You are fluent in English 
We are a remote-friendly company, you will have a full remote or a hybrid contract depending on your preferences 
All of our employees are automatically covered by Health Insurance & Life Insurance. Our Health Insurance (Mutuelle) and Life Insurance (Prvoyance) are Alan 
We have partnered with Swile to provide you with meal vouchers

Enjoy health benefits through Class Pass, offering you the flexibility to attend in-person classes, digital sessions, or wellness workshops, keeping you active and engaged

company_offeredRole: DATA ENGINEER AU DEPARTEMENT DES DEVELOPPEMENTS DE SERVICES (F/H)
listing_jobDesc:
LInstitut prvoit, dans la feuille de route  Intelligence Artificielle , un renforcement significatif de ses projets faisant intervenir les techniques d'intelligence artificielle. La constitution d'une capacit  prendre en charge de nouveaux projets avec lIA passe par la cration d'un vivier d'experts sur une diversit de postes comme ingnieur IA, data engineer, data scientist, data architect, etc.

Au sein de la DSI, le service des dveloppements mtier (SDM) est un service dune centaine dagents qui regroupe lensemble des activits de conception, dveloppement, dploiement et maintien en condition oprationnelle (MCO) du SI mtier de lIGN. Il assure par ailleurs lexploitation du Goportail et est un acteur majeur de la construction de la Goplateforme.

Le SDM contribue aux projets majeurs de lIGN (OCS GE, LIDAR HD) en embarquant des traitements innovants dont certains bass sur lapprentissage machine (IA).

Pleinement mobilis dans la stratgie des Gocommuns de lInstitut, le SDM dveloppe ses nouveaux produits avec des partenaires et dans une logique de communaut open-source.

Le data engineer organise, en tant que dveloppeur informatique, la collecte et la fabrication des donnes brutes (cration d'outils et algorithmes pour le traitement des donnes, prparation des donnes pour le Data Analyst).

Il assure la conception, le dveloppement et le bon fonctionnement des solutions pour le traitement, la manipulation, le croisement et la diffusion des donnes dans un pipeline mobilisant les technologies de big data et d'intelligence artificielle.
Il industrialise et met en production des traitements sur les donnes (par exemple : mise  disposition de tableaux de bord, intgration de modles de machine learning) en lien avec les quipes mtiers et les quipes de data science.
Il assure le lien entre la plateforme dtermine par le data architect et le besoin de donnes exprim par lutilisateur de donnes quil soit data analyst ou data scientist.
Il intervient galement en aval du travail du data scientist dans les tapes dimplmentations oprationnelles des algorithmes labors par celui-ci.

De formation Bac+5 en informatique, avec un intrt pour le Dveloppement et Oprations (DevOps) et l'ingnierie des donnes, vous souhaitez travailler sur les grands projets structurants de l'IGN mobilisant l'intelligence artificielle et les big data, rejoignez-nous.

Vous maitrisez les outils et langages de programmation (C++, python, GitHub), vous connaissez les bases de donnes relationnelles (PostGreSQL notamment) et les technologies MLOps et vous avez idalement une premire exprience en data engineering.

Vous savez analyser un problme technique, valuer un dveloppement et organiser des tests, tout en tout en prenant soin dinstruire les documents professionnels ad hoc et de renseigner les outils de suivi des projets.

Vous tes reconnu pour votre autonomie, votre got du travail en quipe, votre capacit dadaptation et votre aptitude  coordonner des actions avec des interlocuteurs varis internes et externes.

Proche du bois de Vincennes, l'IGN dispose d'un environnement agrable et sa position stratgique aux portes de Paris est un atout avec plusieurs possibilits d'accs  proximit (mtro ligne1, RER A Vincennes, Bus, vlo).

Pratique possible du tltravail aprs une priode de prise poste
Equipements sportifs disponibles sur site
Associations culturelles et sportives au sein de l'IGN

Restauration d'entreprise

LIGN est riche de la diversit de ses mtiers. Si vous avez une apptence pour les sujets dinnovation, que vous tes curieux, et avez le sens du service public, participez au dveloppement de lIGN daujourdhui et de demain !
En rejoignant lIGN, vous travaillerez en quipe, dans une structure  taille humaine, o la vie associative, sportive, culturelle et sociale est riche et diversifie, et dans un environnement agrable.

Travail en openspaceShow more Report

listing_jobDesc:
En tant que Cloud Data Engineer, vous aurez pour mission daccompagner nos clients grands comptes dans leurs transformation digitale par la mise en place de projets.
 Votre mission portera sur des tches parmi les suivantes :
 Analyser les besoins clients
Animer des ateliers afin dtudier et cadrer les besoins clients
Prconiser les solutions et architectures cibles
Dfinir les mthodologies de dploiement et plans de migration
Rdiger les dossiers darchitecture et spcifications techniques
Construire les architectures de donnes
Concevoir et mettre en place des systmes de donnes rsilients et scuriss (datawarehouse, datalake, systmes temps-rels)
Construire et dployer les pipelines de donnes
Assurer la migration des donnes vers les nouveaux environnements
Analyser les donnes
Analyser les donnes sources afin didentifier et valuer des cas dusage mtier
Mettre en uvre des outils de visualisation de la donne
Accompagner et former
Assurer une veille technologique continue sur les solutions cloud
Accompagner et former les quipes clients aux mthodes et concepts du cloud
Diplm(e) d'une cole d'ingnieurs ou d'un Master 2 en Informatique, vous disposez d'une exprience significative (2 ans minimum) au sein de projets Data Cloud : architecture, traitement ou analyse de donnes.
Vous avez acquis une premire exprience sur des services data tels que ceux dAzure, GCP, AWS, Snowflake, Databricks, Cloudera.
Vous tes  l'aise avec des langages parmi les suivants : Java, Scala, Python
Vous tes passionn par la data et les usages qui en dcoulent.
Vous possdez idalement une certification.
Pourquoi nous rejoindre ?
Rejoindre Axians, cest rejoindre un rseau dentreprises agiles prsentes dans 26 pays et compos de 12 000 collaborateurs ralisant un CA de 2,6 Milliards deuros.
Axians est la marque de VINCI Energies ddie aux solutions ICT, cest--dire la maitrise de lensemble des technologies de linformation et de la communication : Rseaux dentreprises, digital Workspace & Collaboration, Cloud priv et hybride, Cyberscurit sur projets ou en Services Manags.
Nous accompagnons nos clients  entreprises prives, secteur public, oprateurs et fournisseurs de services - dans la transformation de leurs solutions digitales.
Fortement implique sur nos territoires respectifs, Axians a une forte politique de dveloppement durable en sengageant sur une rduction de 40% de ses missions de CO2  lhorizon 2030 mais galement dactions solidaires touchant  linsertion,  lducation au travers de la Fondation VINCI et de nombreux partenariats coles.
Entit
Dans un monde en volution permanente, VINCI Energies acclre la transition environnementale en concrtisant deux mutations majeures, numrique et nergtique. Ses quipes dploient des technologies et des solutions multitechniques sur mesure, de la conception  la ralisation, l'exploitation et la maintenance. Ancres dans leurs territoires, agiles et innovantes, ses 1 900 entreprises sont au cur des choix nergtiques de leurs clients, de leurs infrastructures et de leurs process pour les rendre chaque jour plus fiables, plus efficients et plus durables. VINCI Energies vise une performance globale, attentive  la plante, utile aux hommes et solidaire des populations. 2022 : 16,7 milliards d'euros (chiffre d'affaires) // 90 000 collaborateurs // 1900 entreprises // 57 pays www.vinci-energies.comShow more Report

listing_jobDesc: Make our data available: youll work to connect data sources, design database models, and build ETL pipelines via Fivetran / S3 / DBT / Redshift. Make our data actionable: youll design and implement powerful Tableau Dashboards that help our product and business teams succeed. Make our pipelines faster: you'll identify the underperforming parts of our data pipeline and work to improve their speed and reliability. Always be raising data quality. That includes auditing sources, documenting issues, driving resolutions together with other teams, and implementing well-documented, performant, and tested transformations. You have a master degree in engineering or business or are about to graduate You have some experience with, or knowledge of SQL and relational databases, and you want to become a master at it You like a challenge and are not afraid to fall down the stack-overflow rabbit hole if a problem is resisting you You speak English fluently and you have excellent written and verbal communication skills You are autonomous, well organised and rigorous You will be joining a company founded by product enthusiasts who uphold an exceptionally high standard for product quality. You will work closely with experienced leaders like Head of Data (Jean, ex Dashlane, Microsoft, Doctolib), Co-founder and head of revenues David (former VP Sales of Calendly), CEO Alexis (co-founder and CPO of Dashlane) and talented product, sales, data and tech teams. You will be part of an international startup with diverse nationalities and cultures. At Stonly, you will experience a distinctive culture that fosters ownership, recognition, and opportunities for learning in a caring and ambitious environment.

listing_jobDesc:
Reporting to the manager of the Analytics team, your mission will be to maintain and upgrade our data pipeline. 
Day-to-day maintenance of our data pipeline: 
Ensure data pipeline ingestion accuracy in due time 
Follow-up on data quality issues raised by internal customers 
Improvement of sourcing processes: 
Contribute to the migration of our internal stack, moving from Hadoop to GCP as the main source for our SQL Analytics Database (based on Snowflake) 
Migrate from Talend data flows to Python scripts for our sourcing jobs 
Develop resources to make Data Analysts autonomous in sourcing data in our Snowflake database (through ready-to-use scripts or small interfaces) 
Developing new projects on our main platforms (Tableau & Snowflake) 
Leverage new resources to make the most out of Snowflake (Streamlit, Snowpark) 
Identify new ways to structure our data sources in Tableau while reducing the loading time for the user 
Communication: 
Sync with Data Analysts to make sure that their requests are properly prioritized 
Synchronize with other technical teams (Core-Data, BPA) to gather requirements of the migration and ensure a smooth transition 
Understand business needs to suggest the most efficient technical solution. 
Pragmatic & hands-on mindset is required: 
youll have latitude to explore different options, but you need to go for the most effective solution 
Technical knowledge of Python & SQL is a must. 
Knowledge of collaboration platforms (Gitlab) & Agile processes is a plus. 
You can demonstrate your ability to solve problems end to end. 
You are fluent in English.

Des comptences des OS Linux et Windows ;
Des comptences sur le framework Hadoop ;
Une connaissance thorique et idalement pratique de la gestion d'un projet informatique ;
A minima une connaissance thorique des mthodes Agile (Scrum par exemple).

INGENIANCE est une socit jeune et dynamique qui stimule l'innovation et la transformation digitale par l'accompagnement de ses clients dans leurs projets lis aux nouvelles technologies.


Spcialiste des secteurs Banque, Finance et Assurance, INGENIANCE est galement une entreprise technology-oriented qui offre une expertise multi-sectorielle autour du Big Data, du dveloppement informatique, de la Blockchain et de la philosophie DevOps.


Ceci permet  INGENIANCE de se positionner comme une entreprise leader du march financier et avant-gardiste des technologies disruptives.Show more Report

listing_jobDesc:
Performs basic development activities, including the design, implementation, maintenance, testing and documentation of software modules and sub-systems. 
Learns and employs best practices. 
Performs basic bug verification, release testing and beta support for assigned products. Research problems discovered by QA or product support and develops solutions. 
Works under the general supervision of a development lead. 
Be a team player who can collaborate effectively with other developers, development/technical lead, product owner and QA engineers. 
Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Mechanical, Electronics or Electrical discipline. 
1-3 years of hands-on experience in developing web applications. 
1-3 years of hands-on experience in ASP.NET, C#, MS-SQL, JavaScript. 
1-3 years of hands-on experience in Angular/React, MVC, Web API, Web services. 
Exposure to different design patterns and microservices architecture. 
Understands and follows code versioning practices and exposure to GIT practice. 
Good interpersonal, team and communication skills, with the ability to facilitate and conduct presentations to stakeholders. 
Self-starter who possesses a sense of ownership, drive for results and personal effectiveness. 
Exposure in designing and developing enterprise applications using Service Oriented Architecture with SOAP/REST and Micro services. 
MS or PhD degree a plus 
Amaze with innovative products and solutions 
Make our customers incredibly successful 
Act with integrity 
Ensure employees thrive and shareholders prosper 
Adaptability: Be open, welcome whats next 
Courage: Be courageous, move forward passionately 
Generosity: Be generous, share, listen, serve 
Authenticity: Be you, make us stronger 
We commit to audacious goals 
We work seamlessly as a team 
We demonstrate mastery 
We deliver outstanding results
